manual.Rmd

Index

Model Philosophy

  • Quick run time
  • Complexity only where warranted
  • Clean, modern, well-documented object-oriented code
  • Open source - all code freely available & accessible
  • Flexible - model components, outputs, inputs can be changed
  • About Hector’s version numbering

Science

  • A general summary of the science behind Hector
